label: aleph
detail: ASCII code of the letter Aleph (Hebrew)

label: allowrevins
detail: allow CTRL-_ in Insert and Command-line mode

label: altkeymap
detail: for default second language (Farsi/Hebrew)

label: ambiwidth
detail: what to do with Unicode chars of ambiguous width

label: autochdir
detail: change directory to the file in the current window

label: arabic
detail: for Arabic as a default second language

label: arabicshape
detail: do shaping for Arabic characters

label: autoindent
detail: take indent for new line from previous line

label: autoread
detail: autom. read file when changed outside of Vim

label: autowrite
detail: automatically write file if changed

label: autowriteall
detail: as autowrite, but works with more commands

label: background
detail: dark or light, used for highlight colors

label: backspace
detail: how backspace works at start of line

label: backup
detail: keep backup file after overwriting a file

label: backupcopy
detail: make backup as a copy, dont rename the file

label: backupdir
detail: list of directories for the backup file

label: backupext
detail: extension used for the backup file

label: backupskip
detail: no backup for files that match these patterns

label: balloondelay
detail: delay in mS before a balloon may pop up

label: ballooneval
detail: switch on balloon evaluation

label: balloonexpr
detail: expression to show in balloon

label: belloff
detail: do not ring the bell for these reasons

label: binary
detail: read/write/edit file in binary mode

label: bomb
detail: prepend a Byte Order Mark to the file

label: breakat
detail: characters that may cause a line break

label: breakindent
detail: wrapped line repeats indent

label: breakindentopt
detail: settings for breakindent

label: browsedir
detail: which directory to start browsing in

label: bufhidden
detail: what to do when buffer is no longer in window

label: buflisted
detail: whether the buffer shows up in the buffer list

label: buftype
detail: special type of buffer

label: casemap
detail: specifies how case of letters is changed

label: cdpath
detail: list of directories searched with :cd

label: cedit
detail: key used to open the command-line window

label: charconvert
detail: expression for character encoding conversion

label: cindent
detail: do C program indenting

label: cinkeys
detail: keys that trigger indent when cindent is set

label: cinlabels
detail: how to do indenting when cindent is set

label: cinwords
detail: words where si and cin add an indent

label: clipboard
detail: use the clipboard as the unnamed register

label: cmdheight
detail: number of lines to use for the command-line

label: cmdwinheight
detail: height of the command-line window

label: colorcolumn
detail: columns to highlight

label: columns
detail: number of columns in the display

label: comments
detail: patterns that can start a comment line

label: commentstring
detail: template for comments; used for fold marker

label: complete
detail: specify how Insert mode completion works

label: completefunc
detail: function to be used for Insert mode completion

label: completeopt
detail: labels for Insert mode completion

label: concealcursor
detail: whether concealable text is hidden in cursor line

label: conceallevel
detail: whether concealable text is shown or hidden

label: confirm
detail: ask what to do about unsaved/read-only files

label: copyindent
detail: make autoindent use existing indent structure

label: cplabels
detail: flags for Vi-compatible behavior

label: cscopepathcomp
detail: how many components of the path to show

label: cscopeprg
detail: command to execute cscope

label: cscopequickfix
detail: use quickfix window for cscope results

label: cscoperelative
detail: Use cscope.out path basename as prefix

label: cscopetag
detail: use cscope for tag commands

label: cscopetagorder
detail: determines :cstag search order

label: cscopeverbose
detail: give messages when adding a cscope database

label: cursorbind
detail: move cursor in window as it moves in other windows

label: cursorcolumn
detail: highlight the screen column of the cursor

label: cursorline
detail: highlight the screen line of the cursor

label: debug
detail: set to msg to see all error messages

label: define
detail: pattern to be used to find a macro definition

label: delcombine
detail: delete combining characters on their own

label: dictionary
detail: list of file names used for keyword completion

label: diff
detail: use diff mode for the current window

label: diffexpr
detail: expression used to obtain a diff file

label: diffopt
detail: labels for using diff mode

label: digraph
detail: enable the entering of digraphs in Insert mode

label: directory
detail: list of directory names for the swap file

label: display
detail: list of flags for how to display text

label: eadirection
detail: in which direction equalalways works

label: encoding
detail: encoding used internally

label: endofline
detail: write <EOL> for last line in file

label: equalalways
detail: windows are automatically made the same size

label: equalprg
detail: external program to use for = command

label: errorbells
detail: ring the bell for error messages

label: errorfile
detail: name of the errorfile for the QuickFix mode

label: errorformat
detail: detail of the lines in the error file

label: eventignore
detail: autocommand events that are ignored

label: expandtab
detail: use spaces when <Tab> is inserted

label: exrc
detail: read .nvimrc and .exrc in the current directory

label: fileencoding
detail: file encoding for multi-byte text

label: fileencodings
detail: automatically detected character encodings

label: fileformat
detail: file format used for file I/O

label: fileformats
detail: automatically detected values for fileformat

label: fileignorecase
detail: ignore case when using file names

label: filetype
detail: type of file, used for autocommands

label: fillchars
detail: characters to use for displaying special items

label: fixendofline
detail: make sure last line in file has <EOL>

label: fkmap
detail: Farsi keyboard mapping

label: foldclose
detail: close a fold when the cursor leaves it

label: foldcolumn
detail: width of the column used to indicate folds

label: foldenable
detail: set to display all folds open

label: foldexpr
detail: expression used when foldmethod is expr

label: foldignore
detail: ignore lines when foldmethod is indent

label: foldlevel
detail: close folds with a level higher than this

label: foldlevelstart
detail: foldlevel when starting to edit a file

label: foldmarker
detail: markers used when foldmethod is marker

label: foldmethod
detail: folding type

label: foldminlines
detail: minimum number of lines for a fold to be closed

label: foldnestmax
detail: maximum fold depth

label: foldopen
detail: for which commands a fold will be opened

label: foldtext
detail: expression used to display for a closed fold

label: formatexpr
detail: expression used with gq command

label: formatlistpat
detail: pattern used to recognize a list header

label: formatlabels
detail: how automatic formatting is to be done

label: formatprg
detail: name of external program used with gq command

label: fsync
detail: whether to invoke fsync() after file write

label: gdefault
detail: the :substitute flag g is default on

label: grepformat
detail: format of grepprg output

label: grepprg

label: guicursor
detail: GUI: settings for cursor shape and blinking

label: guifont
detail: GUI: Name(s) of font(s) to be used

label: guifontset
detail: GUI: Names of multi-byte fonts to be used

label: guifontwide
detail: list of font names for double-wide characters

label: guilabels
detail: GUI: Which components and labels are used

label: guitablabel
detail: GUI: custom label for a tab page

label: guitabtooltip
detail: GUI: custom tooltip for a tab page

label: helpfile
detail: full path name of the main help file

label: helpheight
detail: minimum height of a new help window

label: helplang
detail: preferred help languages

label: hidden
detail: dont unload buffer when it is |abandon|ed

label: hlsearch
detail: highlight matches with last search pattern

label: history
detail: number of command-lines that are remembered

label: hkmap
detail: Hebrew keyboard mapping

label: hkmapp
detail: phonetic Hebrew keyboard mapping

label: icon
detail: let Vim set the text of the window icon

label: iconstring
detail: string to use for the Vim icon text

label: ignorecase
detail: ignore case in search patterns

label: imcmdline
detail: use IM when starting to edit a command line

label: imdisable
detail: do not use the IM in any mode

label: iminsert
detail: use :lmap or IM in Insert mode

label: imsearch
detail: use :lmap or IM when typing a search pattern

label: include
detail: pattern to be used to find an include file

label: includeexpr
detail: expression used to process an include line

label: incsearch
detail: highlight match while typing search pattern

label: indentexpr
detail: expression used to obtain the indent of a line

label: indentkeys
detail: keys that trigger indenting with indentexpr

label: infercase
detail: adjust case of match for keyword completion

label: insertmode
detail: start the edit of a file in Insert mode

label: isfname
detail: characters included in file names and pathnames

label: isident
detail: characters included in identifiers

label: iskeyword
detail: characters included in keywords

label: isprint
detail: printable characters

label: joinspaces
detail: two spaces after a period with a join command

label: keymap
detail: name of a keyboard mapping

label: keymodel
detail: enable starting/stopping selection with keys

label: keywordprg
detail: program to use for the K command

label: langmap
detail: alphabetic characters for other language mode

label: langmenu
detail: language to be used for the menus

label: langremap
detail: do apply langmap to mapped characters

label: laststatus
detail: tells when last window has status lines

label: lazyredraw
detail: dont redraw while executing macros

label: linebreak
detail: wrap long lines at a blank

label: lines
detail: number of lines in the display

label: linespace
detail: number of pixel lines to use between characters

label: lisp
detail: automatic indenting for Lisp

label: lispwords
detail: words that change how lisp indenting works

label: list
detail: show <Tab> and <EOL>

label: listchars
detail: characters for displaying in list mode

label: loadplugins
detail: load plugin scripts when starting up

label: magic
detail: changes special characters in search patterns

label: makeef
detail: name of the errorfile for :make

label: makeprg
detail: program to use for the :make command

label: matchpairs
detail: pairs of characters that % can match

label: matchtime
detail: tenths of a second to show matching paren

label: maxcombine
detail: maximum nr of combining characters displayed

label: maxfuncdepth

label: maxmapdepth
detail: maximum recursive depth for mapping

label: maxmem
detail: maximum memory (in Kbyte) used for one buffer

label: maxmempattern
detail: maximum memory (in Kbyte) used for pattern search

label: maxmemtot
detail: maximum memory (in Kbyte) used for all buffers

label: menuitems
detail: maximum number of items in a menu

label: mkspellmem
detail: memory used before |:mkspell| compresses the tree

label: modeline

label: modelines
detail: number of lines checked for modelines

label: modifiable
detail: changes to the text are not possible

label: modified
detail: buffer has been modified

label: more
detail: pause listings when the whole screen is filled

label: mouse
detail: enable the use of mouse clicks

label: mousefocus
detail: keyboard focus follows the mouse

label: mousehide

label: mousemodel
detail: changes meaning of mouse buttons

label: mouseshape
detail: shape of the mouse pointer in different modes

label: mousetime
detail: max time between mouse double-click

label: nrformats
detail: number formats recognized for CTRL-A command

label: number
detail: print the line number in front of each line

detail: number of columns used for the line number

label: packpath
detail: list of directories used for packages

label: pastetoggle

label: path
detail: list of directories searched with gf et.al.

detail: name of the Perl dynamic library

label: preserveindent
detail: preserve the indent structure when reindenting

label: previewheight
detail: height of the preview window

label: previewwindow

detail: controls the format of :hardcopy output

label: pumheight

label: pythondll
detail: name of the Python 2 dynamic library

detail: name of the Python 3 dynamic library

label: quoteescape

label: redrawtime

label: regexpengine
detail: default regexp engine to use

detail: show relative line number in front of each line

label: report

label: revins

label: rulerformat
detail: custom format for the ruler

detail: list of directories used for runtime files

label: scroll
detail: lines to scroll with CTRL-U and CTRL-D

label: scrollbind
detail: scroll in window as other windows scroll

label: scrolljump
detail: minimum number of lines to scroll

label: scrolloff
detail: minimum nr. of lines above and below cursor

label: scrollopt
detail: how scrollbind should behave

label: sections
detail: nroff macros that separate sections

label: secure
detail: secure mode for reading .vimrc in current dir

label: selection
detail: what type of selection to use

label: shada

label: shellcmdflag

detail: use forward slash for shell file names

label: shelltemp
detail: whether to use a temp file for shell commands

label: shellxescape
detail: characters to escape when shellxquote is (

detail: like shellquote, but include redirection

label: shiftround
detail: round indent to multiple of shiftwidth

label: shortmess

label: showbreak

label: showmatch

label: showmode

label: showtabline
detail: tells when the tab pages line is displayed

label: sidescroll
detail: minimum number of columns to scroll horizontal

label: sidescrolloff
detail: min. nr. of columns to left and right of cursor

label: signcolumn
detail: when to display the sign column

detail: no ignore case when pattern has uppercase

label: smartindent
detail: smart autoindenting for C programs

label: smarttab

label: softtabstop
detail: number of spaces that <Tab> uses while editing

label: spell

label: spelllang
detail: language(s) to do spell checking for

label: spellsuggest
detail: method(s) used to suggest spelling corrections

label: splitbelow
detail: new window from split is below the current one

label: splitright
detail: new window is put right of the current one

label: startofline
detail: commands move cursor to first non-blank in line

label: statusline
detail: custom format for the status line

label: suffixes
detail: suffixes that are ignored with multiple match

label: suffixesadd
detail: suffixes added when searching for a file

label: swapfile
detail: whether to use a swapfile for a buffer

label: switchbuf
detail: sets behavior when switching to another buffer

label: synmaxcol
detail: maximum column to find syntax items

label: syntax
detail: syntax to be loaded for current buffer

label: tabline
detail: custom format for the console tab pages line

label: tabpagemax
detail: maximum number of tab pages for |-p| and tab all

label: tabstop
detail: number of spaces that <Tab> in file uses

label: tagbsearch
detail: use binary searching in tags files

detail: how to handle case when searching in tags files

label: taglength
detail: number of significant characters for a tag

label: tagrelative
detail: file names in tag file are relative

label: tags
detail: list of file names used by the tag command

label: tagstack
detail: push tags onto the tag stack

label: term
detail: name of the terminal

label: termbidi
detail: terminal takes care of bi-directionality

label: terse
detail: shorten some messages

label: textwidth
detail: maximum width of text that is being inserted

label: thesaurus
detail: list of thesaurus files for keyword completion

label: tildeop
detail: tilde command ~ behaves like an operator

label: timeout
detail: time out on mappings and key codes

label: timeoutlen
detail: time out time in milliseconds

label: title
detail: let Vim set the title of the window

label: titlelen
detail: percentage of columns used for window title

label: titleold
detail: old title, restored when exiting

label: titlestring
detail: string to use for the Vim window title

label: ttimeout
detail: time out on mappings

label: ttimeoutlen
detail: time out time for key codes in milliseconds

label: ttytype

label: undodir
detail: where to store undo files

label: undofile
detail: save undo information in a file

label: undolevels
detail: maximum number of changes that can be undone

label: undoreload
detail: max nr of lines to save for undo on a buffer reload

label: updatecount

label: updatetime
detail: after this many milliseconds flush swap file

label: verbose
detail: give informative messages

label: verbosefile
detail: file to write messages in

label: viewdir
detail: directory where to store files with :mkview

label: viewlabels
detail: specifies what to save for :mkview

label: virtualedit
detail: when to use virtual editing

label: visualbell
detail: use visual bell instead of beeping

label: warn
detail: warn for shell command when buffer was changed

label: whichwrap

label: wildchar
detail: command-line character for wildcard expansion

detail: like wildchar but also works when mapped

label: wildignore
detail: files matching these patterns are not completed

label: wildignorecase
detail: ignore case when completing file names

label: wildmenu
detail: use menu for command line completion

label: wildmode
detail: mode for wildchar command-line expansion

label: wildlabels
detail: specifies how command line completion is done

label: winaltkeys
detail: when the windows system handles ALT keys

label: window

label: winheight
detail: minimum number of lines for the current window

label: winfixheight
detail: keep window height when opening/closing windows

label: winfixwidth

label: winminheight
detail: minimum number of lines for any window

label: winminwidth
detail: minimal number of columns for any window

label: winwidth

label: wrap

detail: chars from the right where wrapping starts

label: wrapscan

label: write

detail: write to file with no need for ! override

label: writebackup
detail: make a backup before overwriting a file

label: writedelay
